pull.title: [Trivial] Remove incorrect help message from gettxoutproof()

events.message: [Trivial] Remove incorrect help message from gettxoutproof()

events.body: no idea what that was supposed to mean. ACK.
I suspect the function was copy-pasted from `getrawtransaction()` above and this line wasn't removed.
If anything I think it should stress it doesn't include it. IIRC that tripped me up long ago.

ACK 9949ebf
